document_data.name: Healing Spirit
document_data.mainbody: '''''Healing spirit ''''' was a [[spell]] that created an area that healed creatures within it.
document_data.Effects: A caster used this spell to request assistance from a nature [[spirit]]. If successful, the spirit appeared before the caster. It was transparent and in the form of an animal or [[fey]]. For the duration of the spell, the area around the spirit provided healing to the caster or another creature. The spell had no effect on [[construct]]s or the [[undead]].
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
